title: Theatre Tulsa – Fun Home
description: Theatre Tulsa and Eclipse Theatre Collective are casting the musical Fun Home. The production is directed by Meagan Mulgrew with music direction by Jordan Andrews. The show contains mature themes and content; producers note that all roles are open to actors of any race or ethnicity, and that the role of Medium Alison is already cast. Minors being considered for certain roles must have a guardian-signed form at auditions. For full content information and character details, see the official audition page.
filmingDates: Performances June 5–14, 2026 at Theatre Tulsa Studios. Rehearsals start mid-April; schedule to be announced.
submissionDetails: Audition sign-up, time blocks, and video submission are handled through Theatre Tulsa’s Fun Home audition page (see link below). In-person auditions are March 15, 2026 (6:30–9:30pm) at Theatre Tulsa Studios, 5521 S. Peoria Ave., Tulsa, OK 74105. Prepare a 32-bar musical theatre cut and bring an extra copy of sheet music for the accompanist. Video submissions are also accepted; deadline and form are on the audition page. Callbacks are March 29, 2026. Questions: info@theatretulsa.org.

roles.description: Adult, mezzo-soprano. Narrator role. See official breakdown for full character details.
